title: Plantarum historiæ universalis Oxoniensis. Pars secunda seu herbarum distributio nova, per tabulas congnationis & affinitatis ex libro naturæ observata & detecta / authore Roberto Morison ...
author: Morison, Robert, 1620-1683.
notes: Part I, on trees and shrubs, was never issued.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
